title: Billions - BBC Radio Drama
description:
Schoolteacher Mark receives the sort of news we all dread. His wife Donna has been in an accident and lies in a coma in ICU, with only a slim chance of surviving. He returns home that night. Should he tell his stepdaughter? No, he'll wait until next morning.

At breakfast though, Donna is there as if nothing has happened. However, it is not Donna, but a clone with nearly all her memories - Donna had not uploaded her memories for a couple of months - and all her way of thinking, provided by an insurance company.

Mark soon discovers that he is not the only one living with a clone and all the emotional and other problems this entails......
